document.full_text: a surprise decision by the u.s. education department to dilute a key rule governing federal aid to for-profit colleges has ended the uncertainty around the companies' growth prospects, giving a boost to the stocks.
document.title: education stocks rally after key rule softened
lines_and_colors: a surprise decision by the u.s. education department to dilute a key rule governing federal aid to for-profit colleges has ended the uncertainty around the companies' growth prospects, giving a boost to the stocks.
